title.rendered: “Decisive IDF Strike: Key Hamas Operative Azmi Abu-Dakka Eliminated in Air Force Operation”

content.rendered:
IDF spokesperson:

An aircraft of the Air Force, under the instruction of the Intelligence Division and Southern Command, attacked and eliminated yesterday (Saturday) the terrorist Azmi Abu-Dakka, an activist in the Hamas terrorist organization. He served as a leading figure in Hamas’ supply division and promoted the transfer of weapons and funds intended for terror in the strip.

Over the last day, Air Force troops attacked dozens of terror targets. In one of the strikes, an aircraft of the Air Force, under the direction of the 215th Fire Brigade, eliminated two commanders at the tactical level of the Hamas terrorist organization, who were planning to attack our forces in the Rafah area.

Attached is footage of the elimination of the terrorist Azmi Abu-Dakka: https://bit.ly/3wNtvOU
